verse: Listen to this message, this funeral song that I sing about you, nation of Israel:
This is what Adonay Yahweh says:

header: A Threefold Call to Turn Away from Sin

verse: This is what Yahweh says to the nation of Israel:
This is what Adonay Yahweh Elohe Tsebaoth, says:

header: The Terrifying Day of the Lord
